    <span id="ctl00_MainContent_DetailedOutput"><h1 class="title">Megaprimatus</h1>The megaprimatus is among the mightiest of apes, quick to confront any perceived intrusions into its domain. With a height of 40 feet, it towers over even most giants, and is used to being the top-tier predator in the region.<br /><br /><b><u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=5&General=true">Recall Knowledge - Animal</a></u> (<u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=10">Nature</a></u>)</b>: DC 24<h1 class="title"><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=26">Megaprimatus</a><span style="float:right;">Creature 8</span></h1><a target="_blank" href="Images\Monsters\Ape_Megaprimatus.png"><img class="thumbnail" src="Images\Monsters\Ape_Megaprimatus.png"></a><span alt="Neutral" class="traitalignment" title="Neutral">N</span><span alt="Gargantuan" class="traitsize" title="Gargantuan">Gargantuan</span><span alt="Animal Trait" class="trait" title="An animal is a creature with a relatively low intelligence. It typically doesn’t have an Intelligence ability modifier over –4, can’t speak languages, and can’t be trained in Intelligence-based skills."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=9">Animal</a></span><br /><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq01y0m?Pathfinder-Bestiary" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Bestiary pg. 23</i></a><br /><b>Perception</b> +15; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet<br /><b>Skills</b> <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=1"><u>Acrobatics</a></u> +14, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=3"><u>Athletics</a></u> +19<br /><b>Str</b> +7, <b>Dex</b> +2, <b>Con</b> +5, <b>Int</b> -4, <b>Wis</b> +1, <b>Cha</b> +2<hr /><b>AC</b> 26, <b>Fort</b> +19, <b>Ref</b> +16, <b>Will</b> +13<br /><b>HP</b> 150<hr /><b>Speed</b> 30 feet, climb 30 feet<br /><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> fist +21 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=170"><u>agile</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 20 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 2d8+10 bludgeoning</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> jaws +21 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 10 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 2d10+10 piercing</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Mangling Rend</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  A megaprimatus makes two fist Strikes against the same target. If both hit, the attack deals an additional 2d6 bludgeoning damage, the target is <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=16">flat-footed</a>, and the target takes a –20-foot status penalty to all Speeds until the end of its next turn.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Terrifying Display</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=16"><u>auditory</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=60"><u>emotion</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=68"><u>fear</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=106"><u>mental</a></u>) The megaprimatus beats its chest in a terrifying display. Creatures within 50 feet must attempt a DC 27 Will save. While a creature is <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=19">frightened</a> by this ability, it is <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=16">flat-footed</a> to the megaprimatus and to gorillas.<br /> <b>Critical Success</b> No effect and temporarily immune for 1 minute.<br /> <b>Success</b> The creature is unaffected.<br /> <b>Failure</b> The creature is <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=19">frightened 1</a>.<br /> <b>Critical Failure</b> The creature is <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=19">frightened 2</a> and fleeing until the end of its next turn.</span><h2 class="title">All Monsters in "<a href="MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=6">Ape</a>"</h2><table class="inner"><tr><td><b>Name</b></td><td><b>Level</b></td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=25">Gorilla</a></td><td>3</td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=26">Megaprimatus</a></td><td>8</td></tr></table><h1 class="title"><a href="MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=6">Ape</a></h1><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq01y0m?Pathfinder-Bestiary" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Bestiary pg. 23</i></a><br />While many apes exhibit peaceful or reclusive behavior, gorillas can be territorial, and the megaprimatus is especially aggressive and dangerous.</span>

    <br />

  <script>
      initiateToggle(document.getElementById('theme-toggle'));
      initializeMenuToggle(document.getElementById('minMaxMenu'));
      var initializeSearch = function (search) {
          var button;
          var text;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.lastElementChild;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.lastElementChild;

          if (search) {
              search.addEventListener('keypress', function (e) {
                  if (e.keyCode == 13) {
                      e.preventDefault();
                      if (text.value != null && text.value.length > 0)
                          window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
                  }
              })
          }
          if (button) {
              button.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                  window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
              });
          }
      };
      var initializeExpand = function (toggle) {
          var targetAttrString = "[data-target='" + toggle.dataset.toggle + "']";
          //target = menu to be collapsed
          var target = document.querySelector(targetAttrString);
          toggle.addEventListener('click', function () {
              var expanded = target.classList.contains('expanded');
              expanded = !expanded;
              if (expanded) {
                  //hide other in group if exists
                  if (target.dataset.group) {
                      var otherExpanded = document.querySelector('.expanded[data-group="' + target.dataset.group + '"]');
                      if (otherExpanded) {
                          otherExpanded.classList.remove('expanded');
                      }
                  }
                  target.classList.add('expanded');
              } else {
                  target.classList.remove('expanded');
              }
          });
      };
      (function () {
          //toggles = link that expands/collapses target
          var toggles = document.querySelectorAll('[data-toggle]');
          toggles.forEach(function (toggle) {
              initializeExpand(toggle);
          });
          //searches
          var searches = document.querySelectorAll('.search');
          searches.forEach(function (search) {
              initializeSearch(search);
          });
      })();
  </script>
